name: Ghoul
description: Fast, ravenous undead that feeds on corpses to regenerate health. Excels at hit-and-run tactics and harvesting lumber.

abilities.name: Cannibalize
abilities.description: Consumes a nearby corpse to regenerate health rapidly.

abilities.name: Ghoul Frenzy
abilities.description: Increases attack speed for a short duration after consuming a corpse.
